com.agsw.FabricView.DrawableObjects

Class CTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.agsw.FabricView.DrawableObjects.CDrawable
      • com.agsw.FabricView.DrawableObjects.CTransform
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CRotation, CScale, CTranslation

    public abstract class CTransform
extends CDrawable
    Created by emmanuel.proulx on 2017-08-27. This is the base class for all transforms.
